g.text: are you trying to make housing a managers mandatory placement as a scape goat for your committees (RRC)reputation?
are you trying to make housing a managers mandatory placement as a scape goat for your committees (RRC)reputation?
it seems as if you are trying to pursue the sunset rule (which is similar to abolishing the regulation)
it seems as if you are trying to pursue the sunset rule (which is similar to abolishing the regulation)
do you get on our nerves (with Sunset rule) because we (people who has housing managers certificate) seem weak ?
do you get on our nerves (with Sunset rule) because we (people who has housing managers certificate) seem weak ?
the company which manages the contract between apartment and housing managers) would have many problems
the company which manages the contract between apartment and housing managers) would have many problems
I am thinking of changing my job(giving up housing manger job) no matter what kind of decision of you make
I am thinking of changing my job(giving up housing manger job) no matter what kind of decision of you make
I would like to assert that the way of apt housing management should be changed
I would like to assert that the way of apt housing management should be changed

your committee is pointing the issue of quality managementcurrent housing managers may admit this fact(low quality) though they dont know whatt he level iswe should analyze why the management quality is low though we accept the current situation(low quality)

your committee is pointing the issue of quality managementcurrent housing managers may admit this fact(low quality) though they dont know whatt he level iswe should analyze why the management quality is low though we accept the current situation(low quality)
your committee is asserting Sun Set rule because you think that low quality has been attributed to current housing managers
your committee is asserting Sun Set rule because you think that low quality has been attributed to current housing managers
Then the association of housing managers MOCT and NGO opposed your idea and pointed your misjudgementTherefore I expected you would approach the regulation reform from a new perspective
Then the association of housing managers MOCT and NGO opposed your idea and pointed your misjudgementTherefore I expected you would approach the regulation reform from a new perspective
but the current situation shows that you did not change your attitude at all and your committee is playing with the regulation as I said introduction
but the current situation shows that you did not change your attitude at all and your committee is playing with the regulation as I said introduction
I want to hear an answer from you about this
I want to hear an answer from you about this
I understand that you can miss the considerate discussion about this because there are so many unreasonable regulations within society
I understand that you can miss the considerate discussion about this because there are so many unreasonable regulations within society

but your committee decision doesnot make sense at all though I understand those situations your committee seems a bureaucratic self righteous in that you already have answer and want to attain it in anywayEven you also did not accept MOCTs opinion even you donot take MOCTs proposed opinionsIt is deplorable for me to see this inspite of majority peoples opposition

but your committee decision doesnot make sense at all though I understand those situations your committee seems a bureaucratic self righteous in that you already have answer and want to attain it in anywayEven you also did not accept MOCTs opinion even you donot take MOCTs proposed opinionsIt is deplorable for me to see this inspite of majority peoples opposition

please let me know how you make the decision in spite of another ministrys opposition and whether you really have the autority to do that you also should let me know how I can appeal by law for your decision

please let me know how you make the decision in spite of another ministrys opposition and whether you really have the autority to do that you also should let me know how I can appeal by law for your decision
once again I am willing to give up this job dont think it comes from my own stake to keep this job
once again I am willing to give up this job dont think it comes from my own stake to keep this job
you proposed ideas about regulation about large apartment housing management and future direction of regulatory reform
you proposed ideas about regulation about large apartment housing management and future direction of regulatory reform

we asked MOCT to report overall policy plan to improve current situation on Nov 2001 and Then MOCT submitted first report on March 2002but we asked again them to revise some of the reportwe would like to inform you that any decision has not maden yet about this

we asked MOCT to report overall policy plan to improve current situation on Nov 2001 and Then MOCT submitted first report on March 2002but we asked again them to revise some of the reportwe would like to inform you that any decision has not maden yet about this
we have a plan to appraise the regulation throughly to improve more efficiency and apartment housing management we will refer your opinion in doing our future work(reforming the regulation)
we have a plan to appraise the regulation throughly to improve more efficiency and apartment housing management we will refer your opinion in doing our future work(reforming the regulation)
please note as we said above
please note as we said above
I dare to say that if the regulation is not needed there is no need for public officers exam
I dare to say that if the regulation is not needed there is no need for public officers exam
currently 60% of korean are living in apartment housing
currently 60% of korean are living in apartment housing
Many people have deams and hopes
Many people have deams and hopes
everywhere people live is the same
everywhere people live is the same
I came to know about politics as I am working as a housing manager
I came to know about politics as I am working as a housing manager
housing management is like mircorcosom of national politics residents representatives are like congressmenhousing management office is like city hall and it solves residents problem as city hall does
housing management is like mircorcosom of national politics residents representatives are like congressmenhousing management office is like city hall and it solves residents problem as city hall does
people believe that politicians will do good things but do politicians really a good job
people believe that politicians will do good things but do politicians really a good job
however civil servants called themselves servant but they reign over the citizens They are more interested in vested rights and graftings because they have the power
however civil servants called themselves servant but they reign over the citizens They are more interested in vested rights and graftings because they have the power
It is the same case in apartment housing management city hall implements the decision which was made by the congress
It is the same case in apartment housing management city hall implements the decision which was made by the congress
The housing management office implements the decision which was made in the residents association
The housing management office implements the decision which was made in the residents association
but who prepared the meeting it is a housing manager
but who prepared the meeting it is a housing manager
housing managers work hard preparing reports and they are professionals
housing managers work hard preparing reports and they are professionals
the invested resident representative cannot get their stake with corruption because of our presence(housing managers)
the invested resident representative cannot get their stake with corruption because of our presence(housing managers)
resident representatives has most of power to decide issues surrounding apartment housing
resident representatives has most of power to decide issues surrounding apartment housing
but housing managers try to focus on their duties rather than involved with interest group politics
but housing managers try to focus on their duties rather than involved with interest group politics
residents representative have more powers than a congressman does
residents representative have more powers than a congressman does
That is they can exert their power by hiring a housing manager
That is they can exert their power by hiring a housing manager
Fortunately current regulation(mandatory placement) prohibit their arbitrary power exertion by residents representatives
Fortunately current regulation(mandatory placement) prohibit their arbitrary power exertion by residents representatives
What will happen if people choose the civil servants arbitrarily without any examination
What will happen if people choose the civil servants arbitrarily without any examination

There is not much difference between housing office and city hall there can be a difference in the content of duties but basically there is no big difference in that they intend to solve peoples problem The role of housing office and city hall are the same I dare to say that if the housing managers dont need to be there is no need for civil servants

There is not much difference between housing office and city hall there can be a difference in the content of duties but basically there is no big difference in that they intend to solve peoples problem The role of housing office and city hall are the same I dare to say that if the housing managers dont need to be there is no need for civil servants

I have one more thing to say Please make more the regulation about housing manger and please do more research about the function and role of housing office and intensify the standards to be a housing manager

I have one more thing to say Please make more the regulation about housing manger and please do more research about the function and role of housing office and intensify the standards to be a housing manager
I hope democrary(division of functions such as administration jurisdiction congress) can be implemented from small apartment housing
I hope democrary(division of functions such as administration jurisdiction congress) can be implemented from small apartment housing
analogy of jurisdiction doesnot make sense dose it
analogy of jurisdiction doesnot make sense dose it
you proposed ideas about regulation about large apartment housing management and future direction of regulatory reform
you proposed ideas about regulation about large apartment housing management and future direction of regulatory reform
your proposal is similar to Sunja Park please refer the reply to her(registration number 363)
your proposal is similar to Sunja Park please refer the reply to her(registration number 363)

we would like to notify that your opinion will be reflected in our future work(reforming the regulation) please note as we said above

we asked MOCT to report overall policy plan to improve current situation on Nov 2001Then MOCT submitted first report on March 2002
but we asked again them to revise some of the report and it is still in progressAny decision has not maden yet about this
but we asked again them to revise some of the report and it is still in progressAny decision has not maden yet about this
we will cafefully appraise the regulation to remove citizens inconveniences as much as we can and to develop better way of managiong large APT housing
we will cafefully appraise the regulation to remove citizens inconveniences as much as we can and to develop better way of managiong large APT housing
we would like to notify that your opinion will be reflected in our future work(reforming the regulation)please note as we said above
we would like to notify that your opinion will be reflected in our future work(reforming the regulation)please note as we said above
I requesting to reform the mandatory placement regualtion about housing manager
I requesting to reform the mandatory placement regualtion about housing manager
I know there is a big controversy about the regulation on housing mangers
I know there is a big controversy about the regulation on housing mangers
there are lots of regulations in the world The key point is whether it is essential or not
there are lots of regulations in the world The key point is whether it is essential or not
I dont understand with common sense about sunset rule of housing managers mandatory regulation which your committee is discussing
I dont understand with common sense about sunset rule of housing managers mandatory regulation which your committee is discussing
if the regulation(housing managers mandatory placement regulation) does harm to residents you would rather aboilshing it rather than keep it for a while through a sun set rule1
if the regulation(housing managers mandatory placement regulation) does harm to residents you would rather aboilshing it rather than keep it for a while through a sun set rule1
why it is between three years and five years What is the criteria of thatI think talking about the sun-set rule itself is contradictory
why it is between three years and five years What is the criteria of thatI think talking about the sun-set rule itself is contradictory
Sun set rule means that abolishing the ineffective regulation after certain time passed
Sun set rule means that abolishing the ineffective regulation after certain time passed
is it really within your authority it is beyond your authority (so donot touch it)
is it really within your authority it is beyond your authority (so donot touch it)

your committee can deal with this issue when the regulation will be nullified (This is beside point!)your committee already admit that it is necessary regulation and then you want to abolish it It is nonsense

your committee can deal with this issue when the regulation will be nullified (This is beside point!)your committee already admit that it is necessary regulation and then you want to abolish it It is nonsense
I was a housing manager and I am interested in apartment housing managementI am also a resident who lives in an apartment
I was a housing manager and I am interested in apartment housing managementI am also a resident who lives in an apartment
most of the residents donot have time and energy to get involved with housing management and some of them are not interested in it at all
most of the residents donot have time and energy to get involved with housing management and some of them are not interested in it at all
Therefore the housing manager should take care of APT sometimes people claim that the resident representatives are the owners but it is not true
Therefore the housing manager should take care of APT sometimes people claim that the resident representatives are the owners but it is not true
I hope the housing management can be developed moreI would like to suggest that the regulation should secure the housing managers position
I hope the housing management can be developed moreI would like to suggest that the regulation should secure the housing managers position
please help to guarantee the stable status of housing manager
please help to guarantee the stable status of housing manager
the role of housing managers seems complicated because there is no focus in housing management
the role of housing managers seems complicated because there is no focus in housing management

we need some alternatives to coordinate complex interests of residents and protect silent and innocent residentshousing manager should have this role but they cannot (because of their unstable status and interest group politics)sometimesthe role of housing manager is not performed well because of limitation in various situations

we need some alternatives to coordinate complex interests of residents and protect silent and innocent residentshousing manager should have this role but they cannot (because of their unstable status and interest group politics)sometimesthe role of housing manager is not performed well because of limitation in various situations
many problems are attributed from the unstable status of housing mangers
many problems are attributed from the unstable status of housing mangers
please secure the housing managers status for them to do their intended role
please secure the housing managers status for them to do their intended role
I would like to suggest the reform when mandatory regulation doesnt work well in spite of other efforts
I would like to suggest the reform when mandatory regulation doesnt work well in spite of other efforts

I appreciate your effort to make corrections in wrong regulation for nations development

It is the democratic nation that anyone who think the regulation is wrong can make a recommendation to the government
we can get information easily by internet by living in information age
we can get information easily by internet by living in information age

Kim proposed abolishment of housing managers mandatory regulaiton on April 8 2002 I found in the one housing managersassociation webpage Kims age address email address was revealed to the publicWebboard message number44Area Ulsan title housing managers mandatory placement rule uploaded time 23:47 200248

(I think) It is a terror to Kim and infringement of the privacy
(I think) It is a terror to Kim and infringement of the privacy
question: is it a infringement on information communication law and criminal law?
question: is it a infringement on information communication law and criminal law?
can we trace this person (who put Kims personal information on the webpage of the housing managers association) and birng the person to justice?
can we trace this person (who put Kims personal information on the webpage of the housing managers association) and birng the person to justice?

What I propose is that RRC should be careful to protect peoples privacy and let people recommend their ideas freely without any concerns and fearsplease bring a person or the association to justice if there is any privacy infringement

What I propose is that RRC should be careful to protect peoples privacy and let people recommend their ideas freely without any concerns and fearsplease bring a person or the association to justice if there is any privacy infringement
In addition please make sure that the regulation (about housing mangers mandatory placement ) can be aoblished
In addition please make sure that the regulation (about housing mangers mandatory placement ) can be aoblished
you asked about liability issues and violation of your privacy which was caused by your personal information was opened to ohters
you asked about liability issues and violation of your privacy which was caused by your personal information was opened to ohters
you suggested that appropriate solution need to be made
you suggested that appropriate solution need to be made
I am sorry that you got the damage due to your posting in our website
I am sorry that you got the damage due to your posting in our website
We will try not to happen such a thing again
We will try not to happen such a thing again
we would like to notify that your opinion will be reflected in our future work(reforming the regulation)
we would like to notify that your opinion will be reflected in our future work(reforming the regulation)
